name: Akt
comment: Found in the C-terminal hydrophobic motif. Phosphorylation at this site by mTORC2 stimulates Akt activity (PMID 15718470).

name: Akt
comment: Found in the activation loop of the kinase domain, and is phosphorylated by PDK1 (PMID 9094314, 9445477, 9228007). This primes Akt for a second phosphorylation (at S474) for complete activation (e.g., PMID 23684622).
